title: Supergirl
description: Supergirl is about a Kryptonian warrior who fights for truth and justice on Earth.

title: Surfer King
description: Surfer King tells the story of a manâ€™s journey to find meaning and connection in his surfing community.

title: Surrogates
description: Surrogates is a sci-fi film that delves into a world where humans live in isolation and interact through surrogate robots.

title: Suspect Zero
description: Suspect Zero is a thriller about a special agent tracking a serial killer.

title: Sweeney Todd
description: Sweeney Todd is a musical about a barber seeking revenge in 19th-century London.

title: Sweet Hereafter
description: The Sweet Hereafter is a drama about the impact of a tragic accident on a small town.

title: Sweet Smell of Success
description: Sweet Smell of Success explores the dark side of fame and power in New York City.

title: Swingers
description: Swingers is a comedy-drama about a group of friends navigating the dating scene in Los Angeles.

title: Swordfish
description: Swordfish is an action-packed film about a skilled hacker recruited for a high-stakes heist.

title: Synecdoche, New York
description: Synecdoche, New York is a complex drama about an artist struggling to create a life-size replica of New York City.
